metadata.synopsis: Reactivity on the daisy dress mannequin (Nothing to do with Daisy) as Shadowheart manages to remember a little bit about it after passing a memory check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Interact with the mannequins

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: This fabric... I think I attended a ball, once. Infiltrated it, rather.
1.context: NodeContext: Memory stirred by the sight of a dress used on a former mission

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: The Mother Superior even gave me elocution lessons. Helped me blend in.
0.context: NodeContext: Memory stirred by the sight of a dress used on a former mission. 'what was the mission? = SH abandoned Shar. 'the Mother Superior' = SH loyal to Shar
